title: 被人发送数据包恶意炸服
author: tjx65448479
txt_content:
炸服玩家随便上线（无须登入）然后就出现outofmemory报错 然后服务器崩溃


报错：
[19:08:50 WARN]: Exception in thread "Thread-17"
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "Thread-17"
[19:09:03 ERROR]: The server has stopped responding!
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "Timer-2"
[19:09:12 ERROR]: Please report this to http://www.spigotmc.org/
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "pool-28-thread-1"
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "Timer-1"
[19:09:18 ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "RxIoScheduler-1 (Evictor)"
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "Spigot Watchdog Thread"
Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "Query Listen

replies.author: uNever_卡荣
replies.txt_content:
可以采用来自水管的GodAntiCheat进行防御，水管原贴为：https://www.spigotmc.org/resourc ... hing-servers.49506/
可有效防止使用ServerCrash发包炸服。
若无法下载，我的用户名就是QQ号

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content: 服务器是BC端还是说是单端？服务器版本是什么？

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:
[安全|防御][SCT]DianAntiBot —— 单端五重验证反压测插件|反假人压测[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-735167-1-1.html



[安全|防御]QQZDCheck —— 基于玩家检验的集群假人压测防御插件[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-667510-1-1.html


[安全|防御]AntiFakePlayer——压测防御插件/集群压测防御[BC]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-654195-1-1.html
  

可以试一下

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
从报错来看是内存溢出
是你内存不够了 不是别人炸你服

replies.author: tjx65448479
replies.txt_content:
粘兽 发表于 2020-2-13 20:11
从报错来看是内存溢出
是你内存不够了 不是别人炸你服
并不是内存不够 已经确定了是恶意炸服 他随便用个号进来服就会炸

replies.author: tjx65448479
replies.txt_content:
苏宁y 发表于 2020-2-13 19:59
[安全|防御][SCT]DianAntiBot —— 单端五重验证反压测插件|反假人压测[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thr ...
服务器版本1.8.9 单端 反压测服务器一直有 不关压测的事情

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
报错来看是内存溢出..
你先尝试一下降低服务器分配的最大内存看下服务器会不会依旧崩溃
